cause.description: Al Gorleone has had a long and spotted past, but we believe that we can save him! His science fiction movie "An Inconvenient Truth", really shows how Al just isn't making a lot of sense these days. We all know he invented the information superhighway, so he is a smart guy but he's running with the wrong crowd right now. Lets help him turn it around! Insolence! 1. Al Gore is a Great Person 2. Al Gore loves spinach 3. Al Gore is love
cause.name: Save Al Gore
